member.name: T:CartonCaps.Domain.Common.BaseEntity
member.summary: Base class for all entities in the domain.

member.name: P:CartonCaps.Domain.Common.BaseEntity.CreatedAt
member.summary: Created at timestamp.

member.name: P:CartonCaps.Domain.Common.BaseEntity.UpdatedAt
member.summary: Updated at timestamp.

member.name: M:CartonCaps.Domain.Common.BaseEntity.UpdateTimestamp
member.summary: Updates the UpdatedAt timestamp to the current UTC time.

member.name: T:CartonCaps.Domain.Entities.Referral
member.summary: Represents a referral entity in the system.

member.name: P:CartonCaps.Domain.Entities.Referral.ReferralId
member.summary: The unique identifier for the referral.

member.name: P:CartonCaps.Domain.Entities.Referral.UserId
member.summary: The user ID of the user who created the referral.

member.name: P:CartonCaps.Domain.Entities.Referral.ClaimedByUserId
member.summary: The user ID of the user who claimed the referral, if applicable.

member.name: P:CartonCaps.Domain.Entities.Referral.ClaimedByUserName
member.summary: The display name of the user who claimed the referral, if applicable.

member.name: P:CartonCaps.Domain.Entities.Referral.ReferredDeepLink
member.summary: The deep link that refers to the user's referral page.

member.name: P:CartonCaps.Domain.Entities.Referral.Status
member.summary: The status of the referral.

member.name: T:CartonCaps.Domain.Entities.User
member.summary: Represents a user entity in the system.

member.name: P:CartonCaps.Domain.Entities.User.UserId
member.summary: The unique identifier for the user.

member.name: P:CartonCaps.Domain.Entities.User.FirstName
member.summary: The user's first name.
member.returns: A string containing the user's first name.

member.name: P:CartonCaps.Domain.Entities.User.LastName
member.summary: The user's last name.
member.returns: A string containing the user's last name.

member.name: P:CartonCaps.Domain.Entities.User.ShortDisplayName
member.summary: The user's first and last name in a short format.
member.returns: A string containing the user's first and last name.

member.name: P:CartonCaps.Domain.Entities.User.Email
member.summary: The user's email address.
member.returns: A string containing the user's email address.

member.name: P:CartonCaps.Domain.Entities.User.ReferralCode
member.summary: The user's referral code, which is a unique identifier for the user.
member.returns: A string containing the user's referral code.
member.remarks: This code is used to track referrals made by the user and is generated by a different API

member.name: F:CartonCaps.Domain.Enums.ReferralStatus.InProgress
member.summary: The referral is pending and has not yet been used.

member.name: F:CartonCaps.Domain.Enums.ReferralStatus.Completed
member.summary: The referral has been used successfully completed.

member.name: F:CartonCaps.Domain.Enums.ReferralStatus.Abandoned
member.summary: The referral has abandoned and can no longer be used.
